text:
The District Election Commission is likely to use its workers to remove paintings from walls if political parties fail to act. A scene at the Poonamallee bridge near Chennai on Saturday. — Photo: B. Jothi Ramalingam

Within a day after the Model Code of Conduct (MCC) came into force after the announcement of Assembly polls in the State, at least 106 complaints have been received by the Election Commission officials alleging violations.
title: 106 complaints of code violations within a day
